subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Fans of the Columbus Blue Jackets have been waiting for  goaltender Pascal Leclaire to fulfill the promise that made him the eighth overall draft pick in 2001. The waiting appears to be over.
snippet: Fans of the Columbus Blue Jackets have been waiting for  goaltender Pascal Leclaire to fulfill the promise that made him the eighth overall draft pick in 2001. The waiting appears to be over.
